testimonials.quote: I finally stopped worrying about my carpets and started enjoying my dog again.
testimonials.author: Sarah J.

faqs.question: Are you available for last-minute walks?
faqs.answer: Yes! Because you have my direct number, you can text for availability anytime. We try our best to accommodate short-notice requests.

faqs.question: What happens if it rains?
faqs.answer: We walk rain or shine. If it's particularly messy, we'll ensure your pup is towelled off and comfortable before we leave.
